sentences.en: Acute respiratory insufficiency in the postoperative patient may be caused by defective ventilation.
sentences.cn: 手术后病人的急性呼吸功能不全,可因不足的通气所引起.

sentences.en: All automobile engines now built are equipped with the positive - crankcase ventilation system of crankcase emission control.
sentences.cn: 所有现代制造的汽车发动机,都需要装备控制曲轴箱有害污染的曲轴箱强制通风系统.

sentences.en: I see no ventilation to speak of, none from a window or a ventilator at least.
sentences.cn: 我看不到通风设备，连窗户或至少一个通风扇也没有。

sentences.en: Inspectors checked that there was adequate ventilation.
sentences.cn: 检查员已检查过,通风良好.

sentences.en: Measures to increase ventilation will rectify the problem.
sentences.cn: 增进通气的措施纠正这种情况.

sentences.en: She was continually adjusting the ventilation system.
sentences.cn: 她不停地调节通风系统。

sentences.en: Some people think that ventilation is the same thing as air conditioning.
sentences.cn: 有些人以为通风和空调是一回事.

sentences.en: The crankcase ventilation system carries fresh air through the crankcase.
sentences.cn: 曲轴箱通风系统要携带新鲜的空气通过曲轴箱.

sentences.en: The new winter ventilation system consisted of a perforated plastic tube.
sentences.cn: 新的冬季通风系统由带孔的塑料管组成.

sentences.en: The office has recently been refurbished and the ventilation system improved.
sentences.cn: 这间办公室最近重新修缮油漆过,通风系统得到了改善.

sentences.en: The only ventilation comes from tiny sliding windows.
sentences.cn: 只能通过小推拉窗来通风。

sentences.en: The reverse side of the mirror should be in continuous contact with air without needing ventilation.
sentences.cn: 反射镜的背面应经常与空气接触但无需通风.

sentences.en: The ventilation is poor, the lieutenant admits.
sentences.cn: 中尉承认,通风设备很糟糕.

sentences.en: There is not a single pane of glass anywhere around the site, and the only mechanical ventilation installed is in the gallery.
sentences.cn: 基地内的任何地方都没有单一的玻璃窗格，而且唯一的机械通风设备安装在了画廊中。

sentences.en: This is a room with good ventilation.
sentences.cn: 这是个通风良好的房间.

sentences.en: This would solve the problem of ventilation, for if a train entered this tunnel, it would draw in fresh air behind it.
sentences.cn: 这样就可以解决通风的问题，当火车进入隧道的时候，它就会带来一股新鲜的空气了。

sentences.en: Ventilation is concerned with the supply of fresh air, the removal of contaminants and heat.
sentences.cn: 通风涉及的是新鲜空气的供应, 污染物和热量的排除.

sentences.en: When fibers swell , they fill the air spaces and thus reduce ventilation.
sentences.cn: 一般纤维膨胀后, 占据了空隙,因而减少了通气能力.

words.tran_cn: 发表；使…通风（ventilate的过去分词）
放出；（通过排泄等）减轻压力
使通风；给…装通风设备；宣布

phrases.tran_cn: 对流通风，穿堂风；交叉通风
肺通气；肺通气量；肺换气

trans.tran_cn: 空气流通，通风设备，通风方法，公开讨论
